points.Event Overview: DataHacks is an annual data science hackathon hosted by DS3 every Spring Quarter
points.Community Engagement: Over 150 attendees from diverse backgrounds participated in DataHacks 2024
points.Opportunities for Growth: Participate to build your portfolio, win exciting prizes, and gain invaluable experience!

winners.title: OnlyDance
winners.description: OnlyDance is an interactive dance app that uses real-time pose detection and scoring to teach choreography, giving users instant feedback and making learning dance fun.

winners.title: AI Dance Battle
winners.description: Test your skills & get moving! AI Dance Battle is an interactive web app where you dance, get feedback, and challenge friends — no studio required.

winners.title: Central or Centel
winners.description: Central or Centel? A real-time tweet verifier that helps fans separate NBA facts from fiction.

winners.title: Script2Screen
winners.description: Script2Screen predicts your movie's success and revenue using AI on its synopsis and key features—while generating a visual and interactive web app to bring your idea to life.

winners.title: koreai
winners.description: Korean color analysis has been very popular recently. However, the service can be costly and inaccessible, so we created a tool that allows you to receive an analysis conveniently.

winners.title: StatPilot
winners.description: We developed a web-based application that provides users with insightful information to make probability based decisions on NBA game stat lines.
